originalText.text:
I've been seeing Dr.Patel for years now, I'm 23 now and her and the nurses at NYU Langone have been nothing but amazing. I've even accidentally called her off hours thinking it was the office while she was on maternity leave, and she still answered and helped me!

I'm not saying that was a good thing to do, but it just speaks to the kind of person and doctor she is.

originalText.text: She is very strict about your health  We are going to miss her She is leaving her office in queens

originalText.text: She is not a friendly woman or doctor. I really can’t speak to her as practitioner as it was an annual visit with someone who’s a young adult with no major health issues so she really didn’t have to exert much if she’s even able to do that... Seems unable to really be able to make actual referrals through any people she knows/networks with,  very robotic and overall an uncomfortable visit. Absolutely would not repeat.

originalText.text: Worst dr I've ever seen. dr seema j patel was rude and cruel. She didn’t listen at all, just useless.
